name: Famous Americans
overview: A single-player educational quiz game developed by Roger Norton and published in issue #63 of Softdisk Publishing's Loadstar disk magazine. Test yourself on how long you can keep matching our forefathers with their accomplishments? A multiple-choice quiz with a list of 8 forefathers to choose from with over 130 Americans in this quiz to choose from. At the end of each game you will be ranked based on your performance. Lots of fun and you may just learn something.
